alert.note: Alert for Lake (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 12:30PM EDT until September 08 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lake County in east central Florida... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eustis, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Eustis, Paisley, Umatilla, Altoona, and Lake Dorr. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
